attributes.action: Hold a 2nd referendum for rejoining the EU
attributes.background: The UK and prime minister all agree we should rejoin the EU

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Commit to a referendum in May 2028 asking the next government to rejoin the EU
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/747385

Apply to Rejoin the EU as soon as possible to increase growth in the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/749128
